meaningMnemonic: A <radical>winter</radical> <radical>table</radical> would be an odd thing to <kanji>deal with</kanji>. Winter can be hard to deal with on its own, but turn your table into winter? Just dealing with your food getting cold would be the worst!
readingMnemonic: This winter table is something you have to <kanji>deal with</kanji>, sure, but what if you just gave it to a circus <reading>show</reading> (しょ)? They like weird stuff like this.
